issue.title: How to replay logs from cloudsim?

content.raw:
@{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} , 

Sorry for my delay response. I just had time to test this. When I run the command I get errors like this: 

‌

```
[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2MeshFactory.cc:72] Failed to get Ogre item for [file:///home/developer/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Base Station/1//meshes/antenna.dae]
[GUI] [Err] [SceneManager.cc:271] Failed to load geometry for visual: visual_antenna
```

Which seems to be looking for the models under /home/developer/.ignition/ and not in my local home. 

How can I fix this? 

Thanks,

Hector.
